string.name: sign_up
string.u: Don\'t have an account?Sign up now

resources.string: How will the food be delivered?
Food will be delivered by one of our clients.He will call you within 15 light years after placing the order.Dont need to be panic and you can have your food better but faster from here.
What should i do if the food I ordered is different from what i get?
If that can happen you could die yesterday.
I am now in Muskito.How much time will it take to get my food if I order it from the Earth?
Sorry,we stopped delivering food from the Earth.
I have waited for 16 light years.And still havent got my ordered food.What should I do?
